name: CVL825 Fundamental of Aerosol: Health and Climate Change
description: This course will introduce the students with fundamentals of aerosols, Difference in gas and particle motion in the air, physio-chemical and optical properties of individual and mixed particles, behaviour of non-spherical particles, thermodynamic properties of aerosol, particle formation, application of aerosol fundamentals and properties in research and industries, impact of aerosol properties on indoor/ outdoor air quality, health and climate.
